csheets.core

Interface WorkbookListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface WorkbookListener
extends EventListener
    A listener interface for receiving notification on events occurring in a workbook.
    Author:
    Einar Pehrson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void spreadsheetInserted(Spreadsheet spreadsheet, int index)
      Invoked when a spreadsheet has been inserted into a workbook.
      void spreadsheetRemoved(Spreadsheet spreadsheet)
      Invoked when a spreadsheet has been removed from a workbook.
      void spreadsheetRenamed(Spreadsheet spreadsheet)
      Invoked when a spreadsheet in a workbook has been renamed.

    • Method Detail

      • spreadsheetInserted

        void spreadsheetInserted(Spreadsheet spreadsheet,
                       int index)
        Invoked when a spreadsheet has been inserted into a workbook.
        Parameters:
        spreadsheet - the spreadsheet that was inserted
        index - the index at which the spreadsheet was inserted

        spreadsheet - the spreadsheet that was removed
